title: Room Event
description: In addition to the Event fields, Room Events may have the following additional fields.

event_id.description: Required. The globally unique event identifier.

room_id.description: Required. The ID of the room associated with this event.

sender.description: Required. Contains the fully-qualified ID of the user who *sent* this event.

unsigned.description: Contains optional extra information about the event.
unsigned.title: UnsignedData

age.description: The time in milliseconds that has elapsed since the event was sent

redacted_because.description: The reason this event was redacted, if it was redacted

transaction_id.description: The client-supplied transaction ID, if the client being given the event is the same one which sent it.
